title: Mainland China posts highest number of imported COVID cases in nearly 2 years
description: China on Friday reported the highest daily count of COVID-19 cases arriving from outside the mainland in nearly two years, with infections mostly from Hong Kong as the financial hub grapples with a wave of infections.
content: BEIJING, Feb 25 (Reuters) - China on Friday reported the highest daily count of COVID-19 cases arriving from outside the mainland in nearly two years, with infections mostly from Hong Kong as the finâ€¦ [+1538 chars]
